page.title: 01Life Styles
page.content: Soulbury/Linslade is situated on the Bucks/Beds border in gently rolling countryside with the canal and railway passing through.Being a short train ride away from London it is considered a desirable place in which to live and houses are difficult to find especially in Soulbury where prices are high. The area avoided the brutal development of the 1960's and averted the siting of London's third airport on its doorstep in the 60's and 70's. The development of the new city Milton Keynes has made a great difference to the lives of the local people as they now have easier access to a large shopping centre and leisure centres, cinemas and libraries. Events this year included several fetes, the Harvest Supper, Bingo, jumble sales and carol singing.
